name: financed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
finance
B2 to provide the money needed for something to happen: The city council has refused to finance the project.
More examplesFewer examplesThe terrorists financed themselves by robbing banks.The City Council had financed the new building to the tune of over 4 million pounds.A syndicate of banks are financing the deal.They are still seeking someone to finance the project.A backer has agreed to finance the development.
